mapper.insert:
insert into drill_record(member_id, type, result, subject_id, suite_id, question_id, answers, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values
(#{memberId}, #{e.type}, #{e.result}, #{subjectId}, #{suiteId}, #{e.questionId}, #{e.answers}, now(), now())

insert into wrong_result(member_id, subject_id, suite_id, question_id, answers, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values
(#{memberId}, #{subjectId}, #{suiteId}, #{e.questionId}, #{e.answers}, now(), now())
